amendment.description: To make available up to $2,000,000 for the Advanced Composite Radome Project.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3538 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Sununu. (consideration: CR S7381; text: CR S7381) To make available up to $2,000,000 for the Advanced Composite Radome Project.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3538 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3538 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Sununu.
